common.placeholder_text: Note: this page contains placeholder data.

welcome.context: You are using $t(app.name) to manage the $t(app.dcb_full) configuration for the {{consortium.name}} consortium.

introduce_libraries.name: Introduce libraries
introduce_libraries.action: Tell us about the members in your consortium that we need to onboard and migrate
introduce_libraries.status_known_none: We don't know about any library agencies in {{consortium_name}}.
introduce_libraries.status_known_one: We know about {{agencies_total}} library agency in {{consortium_name}}.
introduce_libraries.status_known_other: We know about {{agencies_total}} library agencies in {{consortium_name}}.
introduce_libraries.status_missing_none: We are not missing any basic details for these.
introduce_libraries.status_missing_other: We are missing basic details for {{agencies_incomplete}} of these.

provision_systems.name: Provision systems
provision_systems.action: Provide technical details we need to set up your DCB services
provision_systems.status_known_none: We don't know about any Host LMS instances that are needed for {{consortium_name}}.
provision_systems.status_known_one: We know about {{hostlmss_total}} Host LMS instance that is needed for {{consortium_name}}.
provision_systems.status_known_other: We know about {{hostlmss_total}} Host LMS instances that are needed for {{consortium_name}}.
provision_systems.status_missing_none: We are not missing any essential details for these.
provision_systems.status_missing_other: We are missing essential details for {{hostlmss_incomplete}} of these.

configure_services.name: Configure services
configure_services.action: Share configuration mappings and test record details we need to check that DCB services work as you expect
configure_services.status_config_none: We are not missing mapping configuration or authentication details for any library.
configure_services.status_config_one: We are missing mapping configuration or authentication details for {{config_incomplete}} library.
configure_services.status_config_other: We are missing mapping configuration or authentication details for {{config_incomplete}} libraries.
configure_services.status_testing_none: We are not missing test records or accounts for any library.
configure_services.status_testing_one: We are missing test records or accounts for {{testing_incomplete}} library.
configure_services.status_testing_other: We are missing test records or accounts for {{testing_incomplete}} libraries.

migrate_service.name: Migrate service
migrate_service.action: Share key dates and contacts so we can plan for your service migration
migrate_service.status_migration_none: We are not missing expected migration details for any library.
migrate_service.status_migration_one: We are missing expected migration details for {{migration_incomplete}} library.
migrate_service.status_migration_other: We are missing expected migration details for {{migration_incomplete}} libraries.
migrate_service.status_signoff_none: We are not missing a migration sign-off authority contact for any library.
migrate_service.status_signoff_one: We are missing a migration sign-off authority contact for {{signoff_incomplete}} library.
migrate_service.status_signoff_other: We are missing a migration sign-off authority contact for {{signoff_incomplete}} libraries.

operate_dcb.name: Operate DCB
operate_dcb.action: Authorise who can manage your live DCB services
operate_dcb.status_operators_one: There are {{consortium_administrators}} library services administrators authorised to operate DCB services.
operate_dcb.status_operators_other: There is {{consortium_administrators}} library services administrators authorised to operate DCB services.

manage_support.name: Manage support
manage_support.action: Maintain current authorised support contacts so we can deal with any help you need
manage_support.status_support_one: We have {{consortium_support}} support contact authorised to raise or handle support enquiries.
manage_support.status_support_other: We have {{consortium_support}} support contacts authorised to raise or handle support enquiries.
